source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Dasein can’t be reduced to a subjectivity but existential analytic retains formal traits of every transcendental analytic [Heidegger & Kant]
linkedContent: Dasein can’t be reduced to a subjectivity but existential analytic retains formal traits of every transcendental analytic [Heidegger & Kant]

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Derrida’s “subject”: a place or non-place in a text, an instance (w/out stance) for some “who,” a “who” besieged by problematic of trace and differance, of the je[c]t as destinerring of missive
linkedContent: Derrida’s “subject”: a place or non-place in a text, an instance (w/out stance) for some “who,” a “who” besieged by problematic of trace and differance, of the je[c]t as destinerring of missive

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: give up reconstructing the subject, it’s already been deconstructed, deconstructed itself
linkedContent: give up reconstructing the subject, it’s already been deconstructed, deconstructed itself

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Derrida’s “subject”: a place or non-place in a text, an instance (w/out stance) for some “who,” a “who” besieged by problematic of trace and differance, of the je[c]t as destinerring of missive

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: not necessary that singularity be translated by “who” or remain privilege of “who”
linkedContent: not necessary that singularity be translated by “who” or remain privilege of “who”

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Heidegger and Nietzsche, in spite of their distrust for substantialist or subjectivist metaphysics, endorsed the “who,” subtracted “who” from deconstruction of subject
linkedContent: Heidegger and Nietzsche, in spite of their distrust for substantialist or subjectivist metaphysics, endorsed the “who,” subtracted “who” from deconstruction of subject

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: even in the most marked transcendental idealism (Husserl’s), alter-ego leads back to a pre-egological and pre-subjectivist zone (transcendental passive genesis of time and other)
linkedContent: even in the most marked transcendental idealism (Husserl’s), alter-ego leads back to a pre-egological and pre-subjectivist zone (transcendental passive genesis of time and other)

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: also, Heidegger’s foreclosure of Spinoza, who critiques finalism and (Cartesian) representative determination of the idea, risks problematizing Heidegger’s theory of the epoch
linkedContent: also, Heidegger’s foreclosure of Spinoza, who critiques finalism and (Cartesian) representative determination of the idea, risks problematizing Heidegger’s theory of the epoch

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Derrida finds Heidegger’s questions about Descartes necessary, but finds the link btwn subjectivity and representation inadequate, as well as the way he links the subject-object couple to Leibniz’s principle reason
linkedContent: Derrida finds Heidegger’s questions about Descartes necessary, but finds the link btwn subjectivity and representation inadequate, as well as the way he links the subject-object couple to Leibniz’s principle reason

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Derrida believes in certain irreversibility of replacing subject w/ Dasein, though Dasein is still too marked by vorhanden, thus time—the ontological structure is insufficiently questioned
linkedContent: Derrida believes in certain irreversibility of replacing subject w/ Dasein, though Dasein is still too marked by vorhanden, thus time—the ontological structure is insufficiently questioned

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: on the democracy to come, on its safeguarding against the worst: don’t expect a formula from Derrida—but a long, slow trajectory
linkedContent: on the democracy to come, on its safeguarding against the worst: don’t expect a formula from Derrida—but a long, slow trajectory

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: “we” of Dasein, we who are open to the question, to relation to self, to what is lacking in everything that’s not Dasein: this is analogous “logic” to what Heidegger sought to deconstruct
linkedContent: “we” of Dasein, we who are open to the question, to relation to self, to what is lacking in everything that’s not Dasein: this is analogous “logic” to what Heidegger sought to deconstruct

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: in relation to “yes,” Zusage presupposed in every question, one must seek (post-deconstructive) responsibility of the subject
linkedContent: in relation to “yes,” Zusage presupposed in every question, one must seek (post-deconstructive) responsibility of the subject

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: via “logic” of trace or differance, re-appropriation produces the opposite of what it aims for, thus ex-appropriation is not what is proper to man
linkedContent: via “logic” of trace or differance, re-appropriation produces the opposite of what it aims for, thus ex-appropriation is not what is proper to man

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: from Heidegger’s being-thrown to  another thinking of destination, chance, destinerrance
linkedContent: from Heidegger’s being-thrown to  another thinking of destination, chance, destinerrance

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: ex-appropriation does not form a boundary (a closure or a negativity), never totalizes itself, irreducibility of relation to other
linkedContent: ex-appropriation does not form a boundary (a closure or a negativity), never totalizes itself, irreducibility of relation to other

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: subject assumes presence, that is to say sub-stance, stasis, stance
linkedContent: subject assumes presence, that is to say sub-stance, stasis, stance

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Da of Dasein singularizes itself w/out being reducible to any categories of human subjectivity (self, rational being, consciousness, person), because it is presupposed by all of these
linkedContent: Da of Dasein singularizes itself w/out being reducible to any categories of human subjectivity (self, rational being, consciousness, person), because it is presupposed by all of these

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: no responsibility that’s not excessive, must be incalculable, otherwise reducible to program, calculation, causality, or, at best, “hypothetical imperative”
linkedContent: no responsibility that’s not excessive, must be incalculable, otherwise reducible to program, calculation, causality, or, at best, “hypothetical imperative”

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: since there has to be some calculation, Derrida “never held against calculation that condescending reticence of ‘Heideggerian’ haughtiness”
linkedContent: since there has to be some calculation, Derrida “never held against calculation that condescending reticence of ‘Heideggerian’ haughtiness”

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: subject is also a principle of calculability, for the political, for the current concept of democracy
linkedContent: subject is also a principle of calculability, for the political, for the current concept of democracy

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: subject and Dasein (still tied to a relation to self, reserved for man alone) constitute identity in name of a particular kinds of rights, a certain juridico-political calculation; deconstruction calls for different rights, more exacting articulation of rights, more responsibility
linkedContent: subject and Dasein (still tied to a relation to self, reserved for man alone) constitute identity in name of a particular kinds of rights, a certain juridico-political calculation; deconstruction calls for different rights, more exacting articulation of rights, more responsibility

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: all subjects subjected to the following predicates (all ordered around étant-present): presence to self, identity to self, positionality, property, personality, ego, consciousness, will, intentionality, freedom, humanity, etc.
linkedContent: all subjects subjected to the following predicates (all ordered around étant-present): presence to self, identity to self, positionality, property, personality, ego, consciousness, will, intentionality, freedom, humanity, etc.

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: vigil or beyond of question is anything but precritical, leads us to recognize processes of differance, trace, iterability, ex-appropriation at work everywhere, well beyond humanity
linkedContent: vigil or beyond of question is anything but precritical, leads us to recognize processes of differance, trace, iterability, ex-appropriation at work everywhere, well beyond humanity

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: perhaps more “worthy” of humanity to maintain a certain inhumanity, the rigor of a certain inhumanity [vigil of the trace]
linkedContent: perhaps more “worthy” of humanity to maintain a certain inhumanity, the rigor of a certain inhumanity [vigil of the trace]

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: origin of call comes from nowhere, an origin that’s not yet a divine or human “subject” institutes responsibility at root of ulterior ones (moral, juridical, political)
linkedContent: origin of call comes from nowhere, an origin that’s not yet a divine or human “subject” institutes responsibility at root of ulterior ones (moral, juridical, political)

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: in Western metaphysics, incl. Heidegger and Levinas, there’s a sacrificial structure, a place left open for noncriminal putting to death: executions of ingestion, incorporation, or introjection of the corpse > where does “symbolic” begin and end?

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

linkedContent: in Western metaphysics, incl. Heidegger and Levinas, there’s a sacrificial structure, a place left open for noncriminal putting to death: executions of ingestion, incorporation, or introjection of the corpse > where does “symbolic” begin and end?

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Heidegger and Levinas’ discourses remain profound humanisms to the extent that they do not sacrifice sacrifice

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

linkedContent: Heidegger and Levinas’ discourses remain profound humanisms to the extent that they do not sacrifice sacrifice

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: do we have a responsibility to the living? “no” > because the question is asked through canonized or hegemonic discourse of Western Metaphysics (even Heidegger & Levinas)
linkedContent: do we have a responsibility to the living? “no” > because the question is asked through canonized or hegemonic discourse of Western Metaphysics (even Heidegger & Levinas)

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: full rights given to other (women, vegetarians [?]) has only occurred recently, at very moment when subject began to be deconstructed
linkedContent: full rights given to other (women, vegetarians [?]) has only occurred recently, at very moment when subject began to be deconstructed

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: link the question of “who” to the question of “sacrifice,” phallogocentrism as a schema of carnivorous virility

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

linkedContent: link the question of “who” to the question of “sacrifice,” phallogocentrism as a schema of carnivorous virility

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: carno-phallogocentrism: a heterotautology as a priori synthesis, i.e. “speculative idealism,” “becoming-subject of substance,” “absolute knowledge,” “speculative Good Friday” > idealizing interiorization of phallus and its necessity of its passage through the mouth

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: “il faut bien manger” (it’s good to eat, one must eat well), a learning and giving to eat, learning-to-give-the-other-to-eat, a rule offering infinite hospitality
linkedContent: “il faut bien manger” (it’s good to eat, one must eat well), a learning and giving to eat, learning-to-give-the-other-to-eat, a rule offering infinite hospitality

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: sublime refinement involved in respect for the other: a way  of “Eating well” or “eating the good”
linkedContent: sublime refinement involved in respect for the other: a way of “Eating well” or “eating the good”

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Derrida links denegation of murder, in the putting to death of the animal, to the violent institution of the “who” as subject

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: trace, iterability, mark, differance (possibilities or necessities) are themselves not only human
linkedContent: trace, iterability, mark, differance (possibilities or necessities) are themselves not only human

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: unconditional affirmation that motivates deconstruction can always upset an instituted rhythm of every pause (subject is a pause, stabilizing arrest, the thesis we will always need [?])
linkedContent: unconditional affirmation that motivates deconstruction can always upset an instituted rhythm of every pause (subject is a pause, stabilizing arrest, the thesis we will always need [?])

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: Derrida, not excusing silence on Auschwitz, takes to task the sententious discourse of those who grandstand, accuse, and teach lessons w/ it—primarily to give oneself a good conscience [liberal snowflakes]
linkedContent: Derrida, not excusing silence on Auschwitz, takes to task the sententious discourse of those who grandstand, accuse, and teach lessons w/ it—primarily to give oneself a good conscience [liberal snowflakes]

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: a limited, calculable responsibility, the becoming-right of morality, is the dream of every good conscience or that of petty, grand inquisitors
linkedContent: a limited, calculable responsibility, the becoming-right of morality, is the dream of every good conscience or that of petty, grand inquisitors

source.title: “Eating Well,” or the Calculation of the Subject

content: surplus of responsibility would never authorize any silence [re: Auschwitz]
linkedContent: surplus of responsibility would never authorize any silence [re: Auschwitz]
